segments.text: I see a little girl standing near her brother, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her brother is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be cheering him on, encouraging him to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they must be really hungry or just really want those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks like she's having so much fun, even though they might get in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting, and I'm a bit worried for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the girl just seems to be focused on getting that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get what they want and get down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like their excitement is contagious.
segments.speaker: PAR
